title: Rear Master Cylinder - Disassembly - C*7; C*8

body.body: Rear Master Cylinder - Disassembly - C*7; C*8
Remove the boot from the cylinder and push rod.
Remove the circlip retaining the push rod to the cylinder.
Remove the push rod and piston set from the master cylinder bore, noting the relative position of the seals and piston components.
